short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking Request for Proposal (RFP) from vender to deliver and support of software-based systems
description: This requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier two for services in the National Capital Region for the following category of resources:
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement(CETA)
full_summary:
# **R&CS 5 Delivery and Support Team Professional Services - Solicitation Notice**

## Official Title for English and French Document: 

* English: Professional Information Technology Service Delivery and Support Team
* French: Équipe de Soutien à la Délivrance des Services Informatiques Professionnels


## Tender Notice Details

* Solicitation Number: W8485-247844/A
* Publication Date: November 16, 2023
* Closing Date: December 29, 2023, 10:00 am (Eastern Daylight Time)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal


## Description of Work 

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires professional IT services for the development, maintenance, and support of software-based systems. This will include applications and microservices on an "as and when required" basis for the Radars and Communication Systems (R&CS) Branch. Bidders are required to submit a proposal for all resource categories, including core and non-core resources, as specified.

## Key Dates and Information

* Expected Contract Start Date: January 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: December 1, 2025
* Security Requirements: Common PS SRCL #01 applies. Minimum corporate security required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS). Minimum resource security required: Secret Level Clearance.
* Trade Agreements: Applicable under World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Péru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and other specified agreements.
* Procurement Category: Services (SRV)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering
* Solicitation Method: Invitation to Bid


## Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

* Bidders must submit a single proposal for all resources identified.
* Documentation requirements include providing information related to the bidder's experience, qualifications, and services offered.
* Evaluation criteria will consider the combined rating of technical merit and price.


## Tender Document and Location

For more information and to download the RFP document, please visit the "Canada Buys" website.

**Important Note:**


The TBIPS method of supply is refreshed every three months. Suppliers are invited to become Qualified SA Holders to increase their chances of winning tenders. Contact RCNMDAI.-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca for more information.

**Contracting Authority**

* Name: Annick Barabé
* Phone: (819) 939-5900
*
